item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! This site is a work in progress and will be updated more soon. For now take a look at my welcome page :)

item.title: Greetings!
item.description: Sections Resources Blogs Software Books Hey there, Scott here, and I’m working towards my Masters in Statistics. I have spent a lot of time over the last several years reading material on personal development as the idea relates to most areas of life. When I come across people I inevitably want to share some of this information, and accompanying resources, with them. The only problem is I sometimes only have a few minutes with them, so this leads to the problem of how do I maximise my interaction with them.
